about_the_game:
This is the demo vesion and has had the save/load features and steam achievements removed.

Jumping Steve is a 2d arcade style indy casual roguelike game with lots to discover.

Control Steve and jump to stay on the crows, collect the thingys and stay alive for as long as you can to increase your score.

Complete random tasks and less random tasks like staying alive for 2 minutes to tick the boxes in your achievement list to increase the power of your log book.

Unlock power ups in classic mode or use the M.O.D machine for some randomised madness.

Its arcade style of play is perfect for taking in turns with friends.

A score board so you know whos better.

Now with a VS mode, 2 player can drop in or drop out at almost any time.

a unique indie style of its own.

Visit Camp Aign on the search for The Main Thingy and collect more Thingys.

Find items like the Upgraded shirt to improve your jumping and score or other items to do other stuff.

Over 25 minutes of original music to discover.

Compatible with touch screen devices.

The first game ever made by Steves Games.

Created using Construct

short_description: Jumping Steve Demo is a 2d arcade style indy casual roguelike game. Stay on the crows. Collect the thingies to increase your score so you can unlock stuff. With hardly any Achievements, because its the demo. Lots of power-ups to unlock. Not compatible with the gameboy camera.
